title: Culture By Design
overview: Australian presenter and international design expertAnthony Burke (Restoration Australia and Grand Designs Australia) is back, this time to explore the universal appeal of ‘good design' and the creative approaches of some of Asia's most compelling contemporary artists. From Yogyakarta, Indonesia, to Mumbai, India, Anthony meets with ceramicists, street artists, fashion designers, architects, furniture makers and weavers who are pushing the boundaries in developing sustainable, innovative, and ethical design, tackling global challenges like climate change, resource scarcity and social inequality.
